website_summaries.verdict: A modern champagne glass option without a stem and with a larger capacity of 8.5 oz.
pros: These sturdy glasses don't have a stem, so they're tough to tip over
They can hold more champagne, too
The fairly priced flutes feature a nice aesthetic and can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleaning
cons: Stickers on the bottom are a pain to remove

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are such adorable little cups. They're only about 8 oz, so they don't hold a whole lot, which is pretty standard for a champagne flute. They do have a little indent sort of near the middle, where you would hold the glass. So I think that's why it's there, to give you a little grip on the glass itself. The bottom is very slid and sturdy. The glass gets more fragile as it gets to the top. All of mine came intact and there were no stickers on the bottom of the glass (so no annoying residue to clean off). Happy to have these in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Practical Elegance
customer_reviews.text: I just recently ordered these for a champagne brunch I host four times a year for my girlfriends. I already have a number of stemmed champagne flutes; however, I was very surprised that many of the ladies preferred the stemless glasses over the ones with the stems. I originally ordered them simply because they were affordable and easy to store, the stemless aspect was a preference my guests had that I wasn't aware of. My beef with all stemless glasses is that it warms the chilled beverage faster than stemmed glasses simply because of how you have to hold the glass. The warmth of your hand speeds up the warming of the beverage so drink fast lol...
customer_reviews.author: Bookie Nookie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fancy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and looks great! Feels sturdy and because the glass isn’t thin and set is so adorable, I’m not anxious to use them like my other set of expensive champagne flutes I own. Within the holiday season, I’m sure packages are thrown about a bit more during shipping so a couple of them were broken upon arrival. Otherwise, I don’t believe casual use would have caused damage. Just comes in a plain brown box.... nice white elephant gift. Wouldn’t say it comes in a nice giftable box though.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Mine did not have any stickers to remove from the glasses! They do have a ripple affect (not sure how to describe) the middle of the glass but it is only noticeable at certain angels. It definitely is no issue in use of the glass or adding an imprint to them. They were also packed very well - no damages.
customer_reviews.author: maynard0105

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for affordable glasses I could use in my bridesmaid boxes and these worked great. They're a good price and sturdy. I took off a star because like others have mentioned, some do slightly lean and they have what appears to be kind of an indented rim on the bottom third of the glass. Nonetheless I think my girls will love them and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy glasses for great price
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed for my bridesmaids brunch and at a great price. I used 6 for a mimosa bar and 6 to put a “bridesmaid” label on for gift boxes. All glasses came in tact. The shape is cute; they are weighted at the bottom and taper slightly inward towards the top, just like in the picture. They are sturdy and do not tip over easily. There is that odd little divot in the glass towards the bottom that other reviewers pointed out but you don’t notice it unless you’re looking for it. All in all very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kenley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These were for champagne for New Years. I ordered on 12/26 and received on 12/29. Very good turn around time. These are not high quality crystal and they have imperfections, (nothing major), but they look nice and do the job. If I needed to have a larger # of glasses to serve something I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nic How

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my stemmed champagne glasses from 10 years ago, and I love the look and feel of these. Like some other reviews say, some have a slight variation, but it makes me feel like they're from "Sweet Home Alabama," so it's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: vando

customer_reviews.title: Classic & Easy to Wash
customer_reviews.text: One did come a little chopped but all in all these were exactly what I was looking for. A classic, modern look, that’s easy to wash. I just put these in the dishwasher & without a stem it’s so much easier to close. I get a lot of compliments as well. I would highly recommend this stemless alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bridal shower since it was around our pool-area and we wanted disposable for easy clean up. These were so cute, super durable. My dad actually wouldn’t let me throw most of them out and keeps them in a closet for nights when they host people outside. For the price, you can’t beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got these to DIY as a gift for my bridesmaids. The glass doesn't scratch easily, and they are a really nice size. I really only needed 5 of them, but I'm thrilled to have extra on hand to make more!
customer_reviews.author: KK28

customer_reviews.title: Not for gifts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a housewarming gift but the box it comes it looks so ugly and cheap I cannot give these as a gift. The cardboard box and cheap packaging makes these looks like dollar store glasses. The glasses look pretty cheap too and I can find cheaper sets at Target or dollar store but purchased on amazon for connivence. If you are purchasing for yourself or a party then I guess fine but if purchasing for a gift it will not be suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: good for the value
customer_reviews.text: I did find 2 of the glasses had small dents of imperfection in them. I bought them to put decals on for a wedding party and it brings out the dents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a shower outdoors. I decided on stemless champagne flutes because I thought they would be less apt to break then something with a stem. These made a beautiful presentation at a Mimosa bar

product_meta.title: Libbey Stemless Champagne Flute Glasses, Set of 12, Clear, 8.5 oz -
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingPerfect for casual dining and entertaining, Libbey set of 12 stemless champagne flute glasses feature a sophisticated, upscale curved design that's ideal for all your bubbly beverages. Durable and chip resistant, This crystal Clear stemless drinkware is stable, ergonomic, and balanced for less tipping and more sipping. This set includes twelve 8. 5-Ounce flute glasses. offering more than just a trendy, modern design, Libbey stemless champagne flutes feature a slender bowl and narrow Rim To optimize the bouquet, taste, and effervescence of champagne, prosecco, mimosas, sparkling wine, or any fruity fizz. These versatile glasses can also be used for serving chilled water, cocktails, and more. bring them home for yourself, or present as a gift at weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, or any celebration. Each champagne glass measures 5. 75 inches tall and 2. 25 inches round. Dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup. Made lead-free in the USA. celebrate this with glassware from libbeyif you’ve ever sipped from a glass, odds are you’ve already Met Libbey. We rank as the top glassware manufacturer in the Americas and one of the largest tableware suppliers in the world. As the runaway leader, we are setting new standards for stability, strength, and growth opportunity. We believe every occasion — big and small — is an opportunity to celebrate life.
feature_bullets: Easy-to-hold, stylish set of stemless champagne glasses for special occasions or everyday use — twelve 8.5-ounce flutes
Slender bowl and narrow rim optimize the bouquet, taste, effervescence, and balance of champagne, prosecco, mimosas, sparkling wine, or any fruity fizz
Stable, ergonomic, and balanced base helps prevent tipping; stemless design helps save space in your cabinet
Use for casual get-togethers and all your entertaining; also great as a gift for birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, celebrations, and more
Made lead-free in the USA; durable and dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup
